overview: Mayadevi (Mausumi) is the panchayat head of the Hindu society. Didar Pasha (Firdous) is the panchayat head of the Muslim community. Both love each other deeply. But due to religious discipline, the love of the two is imprisoned. On the other hand, Mayadevi's younger brother Rahul (Rokon) loves Didar Pasha's younger sister Rozi (Mahi). The story of this film is about their love and conflict.
title: Pobitro Bhalobasha
